name: Bondai Inc.
description: Provider of travel arrangement services intended to connect multiple service providers and enhance the tourism ecosystem. The company's services allow users to create a group, choose a destination, invite friends, explore accommodations, as well as find and compare flights, enabling consumers to better manage their trips through frequent and faster bookings, while providing a variety of options for the experience-seeking customer.
one_liner: Provider of travel arrangement services intended to connect multiple service providers and enhance the tourism ecosystem. The company's services allow users to create a group, choose a destination, invite friends, explore accommodations, as well as find and compare flights, enabling consumers to better manage their trips through frequent and faster bookings, while providing a variety of options for the experience-seeking customer.
